summary: This is an email from August 21, 2008, regarding the distribution of amended final victim notification documents to individuals named Jay and Roy. The email includes attachments related to victim notifications and letters to Lefkowitz and Black, indicating ongoing legal or administrative communication in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The email, dated August 21, 2008, concerns the distribution of 'amended final victim notification' documents.
Attachments include documents titled 'Amended Final Victim Notification' and a letter to Lefkowitz and Black dated August 20, 2008.
The correspondence indicates ongoing administrative or legal communication regarding victim notifications in the Epstein case.
The individuals Jay and Roy are intended recipients of the victim notification documents.
